/usr/bin/c++ -std=c++17 -pthread -lboost_serialization -lboost_system  -lboost_filesystem -g CMakeFiles/client.dir/Client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/FileWatcher.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/main.cpp.o -o client  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/boost/lib ../shared/libshared.a /usr/local/boost/lib/libboost_filesystem.so.1.73.0 /usr/local/boost/lib/libboost_serialization.so.1.73.0 /usr/local/boost/lib/libboost_system.so.1.73.0
